body.description: Enjoy the scent of the tropics every day. Suave coconut kiss invisible solid deodorant and antiperspirant is anti staining and protects for 48 hours. Our women’s antiperspirant and deodorant stick provides long lasting odor and wetness you can trust. So fresh and so clean. Suave’s deodorant for women has an anti staining formula stays on skin, not clothes. This deodorant goes on clear, giving you underarm protection without leaving any messy residue. The result; you feel clean and refreshed for 48 hours. Feel clean, smell clean. Suave coconut kiss invisible solid protects with a sweet, tropical coconut scent that leaves you to feel fresh and confident for 48 hours. Want to try a new scent. Suave invisible solid is available in an array of fresh, floral and tropical scents. choose from fresh, powder, wild cherry blossom, sweet pea and violet, ocean breeze, tropical paradise and everlasting sunshine. Find your favorite scent or choose a few. To use; apply this antiperspirant deodorant to underarms only. Enjoy long lasting odor and wetness protection for 48 hours. Globally, Suave does not test on animals and is certified cruelty free by peta. For over 75 years, Suave has offered professional, quality products for the entire family, which are proven to work as well as salon brands. The Suave mission is to make gold standard quality attainable to all, so everyone can look good, smell good and feel good every day.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Provides 24-hour odor and wetness protection. Coconut Kiss Invisible Solid Antiperspirant Deodorant At a Glance: 24-hour odor and wetness protection. Solid deodorant glides on clear. Adheres to skin, not clothes. Refreshing sweet coconut scent. Ideal for daily use. Suave Coconut Kiss Invisible Solid Antiperspirant Deodorant Extra Effective Protection Use Suave Coconut Kiss Invisible Solid Antiperspirant Deodorant for long-lasting odor and wetness protection. This daily-use deodorant for women glides on clear and stays on skin, without leaving any messy residue. Suave Coconut Kiss Invisible Solid Antiperspirant Deodorant comes in a refreshing sweet coconut scent that lasts throughout the day. Suave Coconut Kiss Invisible Solid Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.6 Ounces.

Long-Lasting Odor and Wetness Protection Suave Coconut Kiss Invisible Solid Antiperspirant Deodorant provides 24-hour odor and underarm protection. Proven to work as well as specialty brands, this women's deodorant goes on clear and stays on the skin, giving you effective underarm protection without leaving any messy residue. Refreshing Sweet Coconut Scent Ideal for daily use, this deodorant for women comes in a sweet exotic coconut scent that leaves you feeling fresh and confident all day long. Directions for Use: Apply to underarms only. Turn dial to raise product. Apply a thin layer to underarms.

About Suave For over 70 years, Suave has offered professional-quality products for the entire family, with product lines designed to work as well as salon and specialty brands. The Suave mission is to make gold-standard quality attainable to all, so everyone can look good, smell good, and feel good every day.

Suave Professionals Coconut Oil Infusion Damage Repair Shampoo Suave Professionals Coconut Oil Infusion Damage Repair Conditioner Suave Essentials Creamy Tropical Coconut Body Wash Goes Well With Shampoo and conditioner system visibly repairs damaged hair in just 3 uses. Shampoo and conditioner system visibly repairs damaged hair in just 3 uses. Scrumptious scents of coconut, pineapple and vanilla that release in the shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good and works
reviews.reviewText: It does the job and smells better than powder fragrance. Great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft coconut scent
reviews.reviewText: I love this super soft light coconut scent to this. It isn’t overpowering or strong and it feels very smooth on the skin after applying.It’s not a travel size per se, but still small enough for reveal or transport.You can definitely keep one in your tote bag or office drawer, gym bag, etc.I’ve used other popular brands but just from the scent alone I’m switching as I don’t care for heavily perfumed antiperspirants.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The scent of this deodorant is soft so not overpowering. It smells fresh and goes on smooth without being clumpy or wet feeling. It keeps my armpits feeling dry all day. It has never left stains on my shirts. I have had on my tank tops, like undershirt/camisoles where it will run off some onto the edge of the camisole but it washes out good without staining. I love this deodorant and this is a great price deal. Received in great condition!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great price and it works well. Before I used to always use Secret but I guess no longer works for me anymore. So I switched to this one and it works fine especially for the price. Clean, application is easy, nice fresh fragrance, the deodorant looks new item as expected, affect on skin is as expected no sensitivity issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Suave deodorant stick
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant is a good deal with the price and the scent is refreshing also jand it last longer too. I thought at first it would be mediocre product but I think this Suave deodorant can compete with the higher brands which cost a lot. So I would buy again next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: is great price and works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been avoiding aluminum deodorant for years bc the media convinced me that I’d get cancer bc of them. I’ve tried so many natural brands (all overpriced just like Lume). All the testimonies about Lume made me believe it was the Holy Grail so I finally bought it. First, the smell is unpleasant. It doesn’t smell like roses it smells like weird fishy/chemical medicine. Decided to try it anyways. Maybe that’s part of the magic?? I put it on and rush to the bathroom once I get home after just a 7 hour work day (my job is not labor intensive). I smell my armpits… and they smell musty.It was at that moment I decided that I needed to do some research about how “harmful” these aluminum deodorants really are bc I wanted to start trying them. I couldn’t find any information that scientifically suggested that aluminum deodorant would give you cancer or Alzheimer’s.“If you're worried about your body absorbing aluminum through your underarms, you can take comfort in knowing that it's highly unlikely your body is absorbing any significant degree of aluminum through the skin, especially if you only use antiperspirant in a small area and on unbroken skin, according to Dr. Zeichner. In fact, one study found that only 0.012 percent of the aluminum in deodorant is absorbed through underarms — which is significantly less than you would absorb from eating aluminum-rich food (think fish, vegetables and roots).”Lol. So I tried Suave powder fresh antiperspirant ($2.80). And my armpits smelled like baby powder for about 20 hours. 😂 so now I’m on my antiperspirant journey.Also, out of all the natural brands I’ve tried, Schmidt’s is the best, its longevity is about 15 hours, Native is the 2nd best but its longevity is more like 7 hours. So now I wear antiperspirant (Suave) or Schmidt (natural) during the day. I wear Native or Dr. Teals deodorant at night (they last the whole night since I’m not moving around a lot).If I were you I’d buy Schmidt rose vanilla deodorant and Suave powder deodorant and alternate between the two.Dove sucks and so does degree. Even their aluminum deodorant doesn’t have the same longevity as suave, I literally smelled my B.o creeping through those deodorants during the middle of the day. And suave is more affordable so it’s a win win.The Thai spray deodorant is also worth a try, it’s pretty good especially if you don’t have strong odor but it’s unscented so I don’t love it.
The fragrance is too strong for my liking it cud work well for others
